timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:redhataccess/pantheon into CCS-3842-assembly_warning_alert

timeline.bodyText: I have one query here, as we already know, content type can be either module or assembly, we can compare if content type is one of them other wise return. what do you suggest ?
timeline.author: rednitish
rednitish
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -136,13 +136,13 @@ class Versions extends Component<IProps, IState> {
                 {this.state.publishAlertVisible && <div className="notification-container pant-notification-container-md">
                     <Alert
                         variant="warning"
-                        title="Module Versions"
+                        title="Publishing Document"

replies.bodyText: I tried the above suggestions. {this.props.contentType} or {...this.props.contentType} renders empty. I ended up creating a state variable to display the Alert title. That seems to reflect the contentType for publishing alerts.
replies.author: xdavidson

timeline.message: update Alert title to be dynamic

timeline.bodyText: Could I please ask that this method be renamed? I would expect that a method named "getXXX" is a "safe"/read-only operation, but inside of it you are calling a setState. Maybe "resetAlertTitle" or "determineAlertTitle" or something else if you have a better idea.
timeline.author: benradey
benradey
